ns2:testcase.ns3:title: FS-TD-002/PSA-TD-001-021/Ability to not allow account type changes on CD and IRA accounts to any other account type/Positive
ns2:testcase.ns3:description: System must not allow a user to change account type on CD accounts to any other account type and IRA to any Non-IRA account type, Non-Term Deposit to Term Deposits and Non IRA to IRA account type. Success Criteria: System does not allow a user to change account type to different kind of products/account types.
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: v070382

tag0:div.tag0:p: Successor Test Case Linkage : FS-TD-002/PSA-TD-001-021/Ability to allow account type changes on CD accounts to an other CD account type/Positive

ns2:com.ibm.rqm.planning.editor.section..tag0:div:
CD===>CD = Allowed
CD===>Any other account type = Not allowed
